keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide an extra £100 billion in investment including free personal care, starting with investments in the NHS. End cuts to the Scottish NHS.
Labour's £70 billion investment plan will boost schools and hospitals in Scotland.
Implement a plan that pays for improvements by taxing the richest and multinationals.
Kick-start a Green Industrial Revolution to fight climate change and create high-wage, high-skill jobs.
Deliver fast and free broadband for Scotland.
Provide compensation for the WASPI women.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote Labour on Thursday to rebuild and transform Scotland. The UK held back and misspent by the SNP and Tories.

issues.education: Labour's £70 billion investment plan will boost schools in Scotland.
issues.environment: Kick-start a Green Industrial Revolution to fight climate change.
issues.health: Provide an extra £100 billion in investment including free personal care, starting with investments in the NHS. End cuts to the Scottish NHS.

images.caption: Key policies and messages from the Labour leaflet.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Scottish Labour. Vote Labour to bring our country together again. Scotland does not need government in Holyrood and Westminster that no one is scared of.
